name: POLESTAR PERFORMANCE AB
firms: MILNE, WIENER & SHOFE GLOBAL STRATEGIES (FKA M & W GOVERNMENT AFFAIRS, LLC)
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for policies to promote electric vehicle manufacturing in the United States and reduce tariffs on certain foreign made parts in the supply chain
Working to promote policies favorable to the domestic manufacture of electric vehicles in the United States, along with mitigation of possible trade restrictions on foreign made auto parts.
